title: Tirupurâ€™s Saravana upbeat with two Ricoh buys - printweek
summary: Saravana Graphics, a printing specialist in Tamil Nadu, has invested in two Ricoh digital presses to enhance its commercial printing capabilities, including garment tags and premium prints. The company utilizes both offset and digital technologies, aiming to broaden its applications in commercial printing and packaging.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article describes Saravana Graphics investing in new digital presses, a significant improvement in their printing process, demonstrating a business innovation.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 323119 - Other Commercial Printing, 323113 - Commercial Screen Printing, 323111 - Commercial Gravure Printing, 32311 - Printing, 323110 - Printing and Related Support Activities
